title: Language Practical Competency Enhancement Program Using a Multi-Intelligent Mentor System: Integrated Improvement of Grammar, Vocabulary, and Pronunciation

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language learning experience and practical application skills (understanding grammatical structures, using basic vocabulary, ability to read simple texts)
context.additional_context: Implementing a practical language task-solving project in a smartphone-based learning environment. Aims to enhance learners' linguistic accuracy and communication skills, incorporating text analysis and writing activities for daily and workplace scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the roles of multi-agent mentors (expert, motivator, mentor) and effectively utilize text analysis, writing, and presentation competencies for language problem-solving in collaborative learning environments
Learners can improve vocabulary usage accuracy and contextual comprehension for solving practical language problems by at least 20% through knowledge transfer from expert agents
Learners can enhance language learning self-efficacy and confidence in reading/writing expression by at least 15% with support from motivator agents

Learners can revise language projects (presentations or reports) at least twice over two weeks reflecting feedback from mentor agents (three areas: grammar error correction, vocabulary appropriateness evaluation, pronunciation accuracy analysis) and achieve at least 20% improvement in final evaluation scores compared to initial assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
